name: dirt-backend
description: Backend WebSocket server for the DIRT Unraid plugin.

scripts.test:ui: ps aux | grep 'nodejs/dirt.js' | grep -v grep | awk '{print $2}' | xargs kill -9 || true; npm run start > dirt_server.log 2>&1 & while ! nc -z localhost 41820; do sleep 1; done; npm run seed && npm run test:ui:prepare && python tests/verification-scripts/verify_pipeline.py
